r.s: An HTML_QuickForm meta-element which holds any other element in a grid
r.d: An HTML_QuickForm meta-element which holds multiple HTML_QuickForm elements in an HTML_Table. The elements in the table should behave exactly like normal elements in a form, such as freezing and getting defaults and submitted values correctly.
r.n: Fixed bug #10578, elements in the grid with [X] now export their values correctly
